---
title: "Publications"
format: html
execute:
  echo: false
---

```{r}
library(scholar)

# Your Google Scholar ID
id <- "YzHpPVgAAAAJ"

# Fetch publications
pubs <- get_publications(id)

# Format and print
for (i in 1:nrow(pubs)) {
  cat("* ", pubs$title[i], ". _", pubs$journal[i], "_ (", pubs$year[i], ")\n\n", sep = "")
}
```
